content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/" xmlns:moz="http://www.mozilla.org/2006/browser/search/">  <ShortName></ShortName>  <Description>Search  - </Description>  <Contact>support@wordpress.com</Contact>  <Url type="application/atom+xml" template="http://inthelightofhumanenature.org/?s={searchTerms}&feed=atom"/>  <Url type="application/rss+xml"  template="http://inthelightofhumanenature.org/?s={searchTerms}&feed=rss2"/>  <Url type="text/html"            template="http://inthelightofhumanenature.org/?s={searchTerms}" method="GET" />  <Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" rel="self" template="/osd.xml" />  <LongName></LongName>  <Image height="16" width="16" type="image/vnd.microsoft.icon">http://1.gravatar.com/blavatar/9a3cc38df0e1064b2cfaf2510a8614d2?s=16&d=http%3A%2F%2Finthelightofhumanenature.org%2Ffavicon.ico</Image>  <Image height="64" width="64" type="image/jpeg">http://1.gravatar.com/blavatar/d0bd922d3d7f05198688578695efe6f9?s=64&d=http%3A%2F%2Fs0.wp.com%2Fi%2Flogo%2Fgray-white-transparent-64.png</Image>  <Query role="example" searchTerms="photography" />  <Tags>blog</Tags>  <Developer>Automattic</Developer>  <SyndicationRight>open</SyndicationRight>  <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>  <Language>en</Language>  <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding>  <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>  <moz:SearchForm>http://inthelightofhumanenature.org</moz:SearchForm> </OpenSearchDescription>
